books.title: The Transformation of Modern Literature in the Digital Age
books.author: Eleanor Richards
books.description: This book explores how digital technology is reshaping literature, changing the way we write and consume stories.

books.title: History of AI: From Fiction to Reality
books.author: John Doe
books.description: A deep dive into the evolution of artificial intelligence, tracing its roots from science fiction to real-world applications.
